name: Catastrophe Beam
effect:
You must charge the Catastrophe Beam as a full action before firing it. While the weapon is charged, you become IMMOBILIZED and cannot lose HEAT by any means except overheating, but you benefit from soft cover. This weapon loses its charge when you fire it.

On attack: this weapon automatically deals 30 Energy AP damage to all cover, terrain, and objects in its area. All characters within Burst 2 of you must make a HULL save or be pushed outside the area and knocked PRONE.
description: “I’m not going to bother writing any safety protocols in the documentation for this weapon. To be honest, it’s not safe to fire under any circumstances, but I doubt that will stop you.” - Dr. Genevieve Nyambose
